HEADER.TITLE:
Hey, I’m Jose Romero.
 Front-end developer 
 Based in Barcelona, ES.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: I've launched this minimalist portfolio where I'll share my work as a developer, along with my personal projects, ideas, and experiences. Everything that's part of my journey and inspires me to keep creating.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION_PROJECTS: Ideas turned into code. Small projects where I experiment, learn, and bring new solutions to life.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION_ARTICLES: Thoughts, experiences, and lessons about life, technology, fitness, and everything that inspires me to keep growing.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION_CONTACT: Have a project in mind or just want to say hi? Let’s make something great together.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.PROJECT_1_DESCRIPTION: A digital accelerator for startups and an exclusive, growing entrepreneurial ecosystem.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_2_DESCRIPTION: Academy dedicated to Forex and the management of investments and financial opportunities.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_3_DESCRIPTION: Web development agency, designing websites and platforms optimized for search engine ranking.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_4_DESCRIPTION: Un rastreador de carreras claro y rápido para registrar distancia, ritmo y tiempo, diseñado para la simplicidad y la concentración.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_5_DESCRIPTION: Una app minimalista del tiempo que muestra pronósticos en tiempo real e imágenes claras para cualquier ubicación.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_6_DESCRIPTION: Un gestor de tareas sencillo y eficaz para organizar tus objetivos diarios y mantenerte productivo.
